headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Weaponized vehicle discounts and more
content:
Tear through the streets like the villainous prodigy you are with this eclectic selection of imposing machines, all of which are 25% off through September 4th:

- HVY Insurgent Pick-Up
- Anti-Aircraft Trailer
- Karin Technical
- Armored Boxville
- BF Raptor

Check out the Rockstar Newswire for all the details.
